title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up when connecting to a Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear.
EB: The column icons should be displayed in the user interface when connecting to a derby database.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source using the following details:
- Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
- Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
- User Name: root
- Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
6. (Additional steps may be needed to reproduce the issue.)
